modName: Ivoryglass Weapons -Dual Sheath Redux and Better Shaped Weapons Patch-
descriptionHtml:
This is just a quick (stand alone) patch for GynRyles' Ancient Falmer Ivoryglass Weapons using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870/?]LeanWolf's Better Shaped Weapons[/url] meshes  

Also included in the optional files are a Dual Sheath Redux (DSR) patch  for both the original and BSW versions of the mod

[size=5][u][b]Required files[/b][/u][/size]
Dawnguard DLC and The latest Version of Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55574/?]Ancient Falmer Ivoryglass Weapons[/url]

[u][size=4][size=5]Installation [/size][/size][/u]
[b]Use Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer[/b]

[u]NMM[/u]
Download and install AFIGW first then install the BSW and or DSR patch and overwrite when prompted (click "No" if asked to upgrade) 

[u][b]Mod Organizer
[/b][/u]Same as NMM just give the DSR and BSW Patches priority in your mod list

Before I forget if using either of the DSR patches... Run your reproccer or they wont work

[u][size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/u]
[url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?] Dual Sheath Redux[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34950/?]Immersive Animations[/url]

[u][b][size=4]Credits
[/size][/b][/u][size=4][size=2]I'd Like to thank GynRyles for the use of his textures

LeanWolf for the use of [/size][/size]his excellent Weapon Meshes

NeoValen for his tutorial(s) on making DSR Patches

And last but not least NifSkope

[size=4][b]If you would like to edit, upload to another site, or in any way alter the assets of this mod for public use you need to ask permission of the Authors of the respective mods.  [/b][/size]
author: jynx474
